page.title: 07SOLENT FURNITURE
page.content:
On the 24th June we went to the Solent Furniture factory.They make and sell {kitchen units, windows and doors.}They get their wood from{Sweden and {Finland.}There are 120 people working there. They deliver furniture by Solent vans or lorries. They do not advertise their products in newspapers or magazines. The other materials they use are plastics.The manager's name is Mr Donnelly.
The factory has been open for 26 years. They have sales where they sell things cheaper. They have a French lorry come and take it to{France}and a container comes and takes it to {America}where it can be delivered to the people who live there.
